Title: The Making of 'Army of Darkness'
Plot: This brief promotional piece has Sam Raimi discussing what ARMY OF DARKNESS is about. If you grew up in the 80's or 90's then you probably remember these promotional videos that were made to try and sell people on watching a movie. The main goal of these were to show "cool" scenes and hope that people would enjoy what they saw and then go buy a ticket. This one here is okay but it's just Raimi telling a few stories about giving some brief bits of information on the film. The amazing thing is what Universal doesn't talk about in the piece and that's the fact that this is connected to the EVIL DEAD series. It's now known that they decided, for some reason, to make this a standalone movie and I'm sure this is something that still haunts them.
